message: I'd like to pass on this one, thanks for the heads up!

Two for two on low-quality products, I think I'll keep passing for now!
Three strikes, all low-quality. I'm starting to think Alice is trying to get rid of the bad ones!
Thanks for the recommendation, Alice! I'll take a chance on this one. Hopefully, it's the good stuff!
After getting lucky with the last one, I'm not going to take the risk on this one. I'll pass and hope for another good one!
Four for four on low-quality products, I think I'm due for a break! I'll pass on this one and hope for a high-quality product next time.
Still on a losing streak, but I'm not giving up yet! I'll keep passing and wait for a high-quality product to come along.
Five for five on low-quality products... I'm starting to think Alice is trying to get rid of all the bad ones before offering the good ones!
Six for six on low-quality products... I'm starting to think I should just keep passing and hope that eventually a high-quality product shows up by itself!
Seven for seven on low-quality products... I'm starting to wonder if Alice has a magic way of knowing which ones are bad!
Eight for eight on low-quality products... I'm starting to think I should just assume every product is bad until proven otherwise!
Nine for nine on low-quality products... I'm starting to think I'm in a bad streak, but I'll keep passing and hope for a change in luck!
Wait, Alice is recommending a product? Maybe she's finally giving me a chance at a high-quality one! I'll take the risk and buy it!
Two high-quality products in a row? I'm not getting too optimistic yet. I'll pass on this one and see if Alice has any more good ones in store!
Back to a low-quality product... I'm not surprised, but I'll keep passing and hope for another high-quality one to come along.
Alice is recommending it, so I'll take the chance. Hopefully, it's the good stuff this time!
Three high-quality products in a row? I'm starting to think Alice is just saving the good ones for me! I'll pass on this one and see if she's got any more hidden gems.
Four high-quality products in a row, followed by two low-quality ones... I'm starting to think I should just assume Alice is recommending the bad ones when she doesn't recommend them!
Five low-quality products in a row, and Alice not recommending it... I think I've got it figured out. I'll pass on this one and stick to my strategy of passing on products Alice doesn't recommend!
